name: webfeed
author: Paul Gordon
description: The reference implementation library for downloading and displaying webfeeds in the browser.

scripts.bundle: tsc -p tsconfig.release.json && terser ./+build/webfeed.js > ./+build/webfeed.min.js && npm run emit-css
scripts.release: npm run bundle && cd ./+build && cp ../package.json ./package.json && np && cp ./package.json ../package.json
